com.aviq.tv.android.home.state
Class BaseState

java.lang.Object
  com.aviq.tv.android.home.state.BaseState
Direct Known Subclasses:
EPGState, InfoState, MenuState, SettingsState, TVState, WatchlistState
public class BaseState
extends java.lang.Object

Base class of all application visible states. A state may be set as background or overlay. A state is active if appears on top of the States stack.

Constructor Summary
BaseState(StateManager stateManager)
          Initialize State instance.

          Called when a State is about to disappear from the screen.

Parameters:

Method Detail

show

public void show(Bundle params)
Called when a State is about to appear on the screen. The method can be overwritten in order to initialize visualization.

Parameters:
params - The params set to this State when showing

hide

public void hide()
Called when a State is about to disappear from the screen.

isShown

public boolean isShown()
Check if this State is visible on the screen

Returns:
true if this State is visible on the screen

onKeyDown

public boolean onKeyDown(int keyCode,
                         KeyEvent event)
                  throws StateException
Method consuming key down event if the State is currently active

Parameters:
keyCode - The value in event.getKeyCode().
event - Description of the key event.
Returns:
Return true to prevent this event from being propagated further, or false to indicate that you have not handled this event and it should continue to be propagated.
Throws:
StateException

onKeyUp

public boolean onKeyUp(int keyCode,
                       KeyEvent event)
                throws StateException
Method consuming key up event if the State is currently active

Parameters:
keyCode - The value in event.getKeyCode().
event - Description of the key event.
Returns:
Return true to prevent this event from being propagated further, or false to indicate that you have not handled this event and it should continue to be propagated.
Throws:
StateException
